name: transport, freight, lorry, all sizes, EURO1 to generic market for transport, freight, lorry, unspecified | transport, freight, lorry, unspecified | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20652/documentation

This is a linking activity which transfers part of the production volume of the specific transport, freight, lorry of all sizes, EURO1 to the generic market for transport, freight, lorry, unspecified.;The transport, freight, lorry, unspecified is meant to be used by activities, where the size and EURO class of the transport supplied is unkown. 

The activity strats with the lorries of different sizes with EURO1 class.

The activity ends with the supply of the generic product, transport, freight, lorry, unspecified.
category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4923:Freight transport by road

flow.name: transport, freight, lorry, unspecified
flow.category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4923:Freight transport by road

exchanges.description:
Calculated from the production volumes.

The production volume is taken from the "transport, freight, lorry, ..., EURO3" activities. There the production volumes for Europe are taken from the TREMOVE project and the GLO production volumes are calculated using GDP scaling. If the GDP of the whole world (GLO) is 1 the GDP of Europe (RER) is 0.289.

It is estimated, that 10% of this transport is used for transport of goods in need of atmosphere control. And thus this production volume is included in the "transport, freight, lorry ... with refrigeration machine" datasets.

It is also estimated, that 50% of the production volume of this transport is transfered to the generic market for transport, freight, lorry, unspecified. Which means, that 50% of people using this transport do not know or do not care about the size of the vehicle and the EURO class.
